column4: How can I see the desktop GUI of my server trough vncviewer or browser ?
but just i can see the terminal only
does you server have a GUI installed?
go on your server and share the desktop
Ssytem > Preferences > Remote Desktop.  That will start  vnc server with default port of 5900
on the client box just open up Applications > Internet > remote Desktop viewer   and connect to your server.
do you know any command line for do it ?
You don't have GUi access to the server locally?
you also need to be logged in on the server in gnome for that to work.
I have another option let me look up package names hold on.
thanks ... i will be reading something here
sudo aptitude install tightvncserver tightvnc-java on the server.  Then you can point a webrowser at it the port vnc-java gives and take control of a session.
